column1: Master of Science in Technology Leadership and Entrepreneurship
column2: The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
column3: School of Engineering - Taught Postgraduate Programs
column5: Jointly offered by the School of Engineering and the School of Business and Management, this unique Master of Science (MSc) program seeks to nurture engineering talents with entrepreneurial spirit and design and system thinking mindset so they can start their own business using innovative technologies or to initiate innovation within companies.
column7: 2024/25 Fall intake - Full-time students: HK$200,000 - paid in 2 installments - Part-time students: HK$200,000 - paid in 4 installments
